examples: Can you add these numbers together?
Please add your name to the list.
I need to add some more salt to the soup.
Por favor, adicione seu nome à lista.
Eu preciso adicionar mais sal na sopa.

suggested: Why did the math book look so sad? Because it had too many problems to 'add' up.
I wish I could add more hours to the day.
I can't believe they want to add more work to my already busy schedule.
Did you know you can add vinegar to your laundry to remove stubborn stains?
I love the smell of cookies baking in the oven, especially when you add cinnamon to the recipe.
Adding a layer of soft fur to your jacket can make it much warmer and more comfortable.
Adding personal touches to your home decor can make it feel more like a reflection of your personality and style.
